feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What animal is always at a baseball game? A bat.
entry.summary: What animal is always at a baseball game? A bat.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: How do you talk to a giant? Use big words.
entry.summary: How do you talk to a giant? Use big words.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: How does the moon cut his hair? Eclipse it.
entry.summary: How does the moon cut his hair? Eclipse it.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What is a tornado’s favorite game to play? Twister.
entry.summary: What is a tornado’s favorite game to play? Twister.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: How do we know that the ocean is friendly? It waves.
entry.summary: How do we know that the ocean is friendly? It waves.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What did one volcano say to the other? I lava you.
entry.summary: What did one volcano say to the other? I lava you.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What is a computer’s favorite snack? Computer chips.
entry.summary: What is a computer’s favorite snack? Computer chips.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What’s worse than finding a worm in your apple? Finding half a worm.
entry.summary: What’s worse than finding a worm in your apple? Finding half a worm.

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: What building in your town has the most stories?
entry.summary: What building in your town has the most stories?

entry.title: Daily Dad Joke 4U
entry.content: How are false teeth like stars? They come out at night.
entry.summary: How are false teeth like stars? They come out at night.
